doc:
Nigel Havers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigel_Havers 0 Nigel Allan Havers (born 6 November 1951) is an English actor. He played Lord Andrew Lindsay in the 1981 British film Chariots of Fire, earning a BAFTA nomination for the role and Tom Latimer in the British TV comedy series Don't Wait Up. He portrayed the role of Lewis Archer in Coronation Street from 2009-10. He returned to the role in 2012 and left again in February 2013. He returned again on 1 June 2018. Nigel_Allan_Havers ( born_6_November_1951 ) is an_English_actor . He played Lord_Andrew_Lindsay in the_1981_British_film_Chariots of Fire , earning a_BAFTA_nomination for the_role and Tom_Latimer in the_British_TV_comedy_series Do_n't_Wait Up . He portrayed the_role of Lewis_Archer in Coronation_Street from 2009-10 . He returned to the_role in 2012 and left again in February_2013 . He returned again on 1_June_2018 .
